00039 /// MatchedFilter implementation of the PeakDetector interface. 
00040 
00041 class PWIZ_API_DECL PeakDetectorMatchedFilter : public PeakDetector
00042 {
00043     public:
00044 
00045     /// structure for holding configuration
00046     struct PWIZ_API_DECL Config
00047     {
00048         /// IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator pointer, must be valid for PeakDetector lifetime 
00049         const proteome::IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator* isotopeEnvelopeEstimator;
00050 
00051         /// number of filter correlations computed per frequency step 
00052         int filterMatchRate;
00053 
00054         /// number of filter samples taken on either side of 0
00055         int filterSampleRadius;
00056 
00057         /// noise floor multiple for initial peak reporting threshold 
00058         double peakThresholdFactor;
00059 
00060         /// maximum correlation angle (degrees) for initial peak reporting 
00061         double peakMaxCorrelationAngle;
00062 
00063         /// noise floor multiple for isotope filter threshold 
00064         double isotopeThresholdFactor;
00065 
00066         /// noise floor multiple for monoisotopic peak threshold 
00067         double monoisotopicPeakThresholdFactor;
00068 
00069         /// isotope filter maximum charge state to score
00070         int isotopeMaxChargeState;
00071 
00072         /// isotope filter maximum number of neutrons to score
00073         int isotopeMaxNeutronCount; 
00074 
00075         /// multiple peaks within this radius (Hz) are reported as single peak
00076         double collapseRadius; 
00077 
00078         /// use the magnitude of the peak shape filter kernel for finding peaks 
00079         bool useMagnitudeFilter;
00080 
00081         /// log detail level (0 == normal, 1 == extra)
00082         int logDetailLevel; 
00083 
00084         /// log stream (0 == no logging)
00085         std::ostream*  log;
00086 
00087         Config()
00088         :   isotopeEnvelopeEstimator(0),
00089             filterMatchRate(0),
00090             filterSampleRadius(0),
00091             peakThresholdFactor(0), 
00092             peakMaxCorrelationAngle(0),
00093             isotopeThresholdFactor(0),
00094             monoisotopicPeakThresholdFactor(0),
00095             isotopeMaxChargeState(0),
00096             isotopeMaxNeutronCount(0),
00097             collapseRadius(0),
00098             useMagnitudeFilter(false),
00099             logDetailLevel(0),
00100             log(0)
00101         {}
00102     };
00103 
00104 
00105     /// \name Instantiation 
00106     //@{
00107 
00108     /// create an instance.
00109     static std::auto_ptr<PeakDetectorMatchedFilter> create(const Config& config);
00110 
00111     virtual ~PeakDetectorMatchedFilter(){}
00112     //@}
00113 
00114 
00115     /// \name PeakDetector interface
00116     //@{
00117     virtual void findPeaks(const pwiz::data::FrequencyData& fd, 
00118                            pwiz::data::peakdata::Scan& result) const = 0; 
00119     //@}
00120 
00121 
00122     /// \name PeakDetectorMatchedFilter interface
00123     //@{
00124 
00125     /// access to the configuration
00126     virtual const Config& config() const = 0;
00127 
00128     /// structure for holding the matched filter calculation results
00129     struct PWIZ_API_DECL Score
00130     {
00131         double frequency;
00132         int charge;
00133         int neutronCount;
00134         double value;
00135 
00136         double monoisotopicFrequency;
00137         std::complex<double> monoisotopicIntensity;
00138         int peakCount;
00139 
00140         std::vector<pwiz::data::peakdata::Peak> peaks;
00141 
00142         Score(double _f = 0, int _c = 0, int _n = 0)
00143         :   frequency(_f), charge(_c), neutronCount(_n),
00144             value(0), monoisotopicFrequency(0), monoisotopicIntensity(0),
00145             peakCount(0)
00146         {}
00147     };
00148 
00149     /// same as PeakDetector::findPeaks(), but provides additional Score information
00150     virtual void findPeaks(const pwiz::data::FrequencyData& fd, 
00151                            pwiz::data::peakdata::Scan& result,
00152                            std::vector<Score>& scores) const = 0; 
00153 
00154     //@}
00155 };
